review: I am suffering from cold since last 6 months. When I take some medicine - ( Sumo cold, Cetzine, prednisolone 10 mg,) I get relief. After a week, the problem comes again due to cold.

review: He patiently heard my complains and also explained treatment. His way of treatment is soothing. I would certainly recommend him
My experience was very good, doctor was very patient and humble. Prescribed medicine which was easily available.

Doctor Ravikumara is very sweet person and he hear my entire lifestyle and based on that started treatment and in my second visit I am able feeling the changes 
Doctors medicines are good I recommend him for all my friends and relatives. 
Thank you very much sir for guiding me right treatment at right time.
